explains: n. 冰铜；无光粗糙层；影像形板
adj. 无光泽的；不光滑的
wordGroup: matte finish 无光表面；喷砂面；（镀锡板的）糙面精整

sentences.en: It feels smooth, but slightly matte, so it isn't slippery.
sentences.cn: 它感觉是如此的平滑，淡淡的磨砂层又增强了它的质感，所以他也不是那么光滑。

sentences.en: Plush leather, matte-finish tactile buttons: quality craftsmanship.
sentences.cn: 舒适豪华的皮革，磨砂触觉按钮:高品质工艺。

sentences.en: DON't wear makeup that is too matte, especially foundation and lipstick.
sentences.cn: 化妆不需要使自己看起来非常光滑，特别要注意粉底和口红。
